articles.description: The premium foldable smartphone is believed to be the highlight of the virtual event.
articles.content: Samsung is all set to unveil its next generation of foldable smartphones at the upcoming Samsung Galaxy Unpacked event on August 10. The South Korean smartphone giant has teased an image of its lates… [+1273 chars]
